text: John Capodice (December 25, 1941 - December 30, 2024)"John Capodice". TVSA.org. was an American character actor. He was born in Chicago. His career began in 1978. He was known for his roles in Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, Naked Gun 33â…“: The Final Insult (1994), Speed (1994), Independence Day (1996), and Enemy of the State (1998). Capodice died on December 30, 2024, five days after his 83rd birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:2024 deaths
title: John Capodice
